channel.title: Please read , Need VPS!
channel.description: Hey guys i'm new to all this and i have a source/client could some one please tell me where i can purchase a cheap first time VPS and tell me how i can connect it to my server yes i have a no-ip :D reply or visit http://swaggpkz.createaforum.com/index.php and talk to me there.

item.title: Please read , Need VPS!
item.dc:creator: @T_h_3 T h 3
item.description:
@T_h_3 wrote:

You won’t need a vps anytime soon

First things first.

1.) Open your Client and go to Client.java, Search for “Server =” You will need to change the current value of Server to your no-ip address.

2.) Compile both your Client and your server then run your server.

3.) Now you can send your friends the client and they can log into your server as long as its running.

I suggest you read up on some guides. Good luck !

Read full topic
